item.title: Will Central Banks Launch Their Own Bitcoin?
item.description:
Will Central Banks Launch Their Own Bitcoin?

Bitcoin and Blockchain are technologies which have the potential to dramatically change the world. If Blockchain technology is deployed rapidly and effectively, we can bank the unbanked, automate contracts and even get Blockchains to work with the Internet of Things (IOT) to create a Blockchain of Things.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Trading The Asian Session - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Trading The Asian Session - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. When we conducted the first of our two bitcoin price watch piece analyses this morning, we went into markets with something of a bullish bias. Action has now matured throughout the European session on Wednesday, and this bias looks to have been a bit premature.

item.title: California 'BitLicense' Dropped For Now - Bitcoin News
item.description:
California 'BitLicense' Dropped For Now - Bitcoin News

The state of California has officially ceased further plans to adopt cryptocurrency legislation this year. The lawmakers attempting to create their own form of the New York BitLicense with Bill AB-1326. The legislation will remain untouched until next year, when authorities may revisit the Bill and try to introduce it again.

item.title: The New Rich List: The UK's First Entrepreneur Funding and Accelerator Company
item.description:
The New Rich List: The UK's First Entrepreneur Funding and Accelerator Company

A new company that will enable startups to pitch their business model, get funded and receive top-level mentoring has been launched. Called The New Rich List, it will help startups receive access to the New Rich List's database of 50,000 customers.

item.title: OXBTC Releases New BTC/ETH Cloudhash Hosting Services
item.description:
OXBTC Releases New BTC/ETH Cloudhash Hosting Services

OXBTC (www.oxbtc.com) - the China-based cloud mining platform lately announced its business shift from pure cloud hashrates selling to cloudhash hosting services - which provide more lucrative mining options for investors with much lower prices and maintenance fees. It has also released two cloudhash hosting contracts for Bitcoin and Ether mining (first in the world).

item.title: LEOcoin, The Global Cryptocurrency for Entrepreneurs, Releases White Paper
item.description:
LEOcoin, The Global Cryptocurrency for Entrepreneurs, Releases White Paper

August 17, 2016 - LEOcoin has been constantly gaining the attention of entrepreneurs, governments and private enterprises across the world. The digital currency is empowering individuals and businesses by offering them a fast and secure mode of transaction.

item.title: Shapeshift Transforms KeepKey Hardware Wallet into an Exchange
item.description:
Shapeshift Transforms KeepKey Hardware Wallet into an Exchange

The hardware wallet manufacturer KeepKey (KeepKey.com) has just announced its partnership with the Shapeshift exchange. With this collaboration, KeepKey will be the first-ever hardware wallet to integrate with an exchange. Also read: The OpenDime 'Bitcoin Stick' Review The new partnership with Shapeshift will allow KeepKey users to securely exchange a wide variety of digital assets from the hardware device.

item.title: Ethereum Prediction Market Service Takes First Steps With Beta Launch - CoinDesk
item.description:
Ethereum Prediction Market Service Takes First Steps With Beta Launch - CoinDesk

A new prediction market platform is set to go live on the ethereum network this week. Called Gnosis, the project will allow users to wager on future events by asking and answering questions about the outcome of sports games or elections.

item.title: How many bitcoins are there currently in circulation?
item.description:
How many bitcoins are there currently in circulation?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. Join them; it only takes a minute: Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top If you are running Bitcoin Core, you can see the total amount in circulation using the RPC call gettxoutsetinfo (in the Bitcoin-Qt debug console, or using bitcoin-cli if you run bitcoind).

item.title: Why Are All the High Rollers Moving Their Action to mBit Casino?
item.description:
Why Are All the High Rollers Moving Their Action to mBit Casino?

August 17, 2016, Curacao - Bitcoin and its underlying technology have been creating waves across the industries with their disruptive nature. Among all the industries, this revolutionary invention has impacted online gambling industry the most. With Bitcoin, it is now possible for the gambling platforms to offer instant withdrawal options to their users so that they can receive immediate payouts.
